Personal Project

Harmony Engine: From Concept to 5K+ Users

Challenge

Create an AI-powered music composition tool that actually understands musical theory

Solution

Built an intelligent system that combines machine learning with deep music theory knowledge

Results

  • 5,000+ active musicians using the platform
  • 4.9/5 star rating from users
  • Featured in Electronic Musician Magazine
  • Integrated with major DAWs

Philosophy Essays Platform

Challenge

Create a platform for deep philosophical discourse that encourages thoughtful engagement

Solution

Developed a unique comment system with threading, emphasis on quality over quantity

Results

  • Average reading time: 12 minutes
